glass_shard.name: Glass Shard
glass_shard.description: A fragment of crystallized time. Cuts that which moves out of rhythm.

vial_liquid_seconds.name: Vial of Liquid Seconds
vial_liquid_seconds.description: A golden, twitching fluid. The rich drank time like wine, believing it would keep their glass skins from growing dull.

stopped_watch.name: The Stopped Watch
stopped_watch.description: A pocket watch with hands fused to the face. It feels impossibly heavy. A keepsake of the Architect.

rusty_key_hand.name: The Rusty Key-Hand
rusty_key_hand.description: A mechanical hand clutching a key. Opens Maintenance Doors throughout the Shardscape.

breath_of_creator.name: Breath of the Creator
breath_of_creator.description: He gave his breath to make them beautiful, but he had no breath left to tell them they were fragile.

tuning_fork_spear.name: Tuning Fork Spear
tuning_fork_spear.description: A massive, two-pronged spear made of heavy iron. It hums with a low, headache-inducing frequency. Standard issue for the Silence Guard, used to skewer dissonance.

foremans_ledger.name: The Foreman's Ledger
foremans_ledger.description: "Batch 404. Soft. Absorbent. Discard immediately." A record of the failures thrown into the pit. Your designation is the last entry.

shattered_monocle.name: Shattered Monocle
shattered_monocle.description: A lens cracked down the middle. Through it, you can see faint outlines of things that aren't there. Or perhaps, things that shouldn't be.

old_cogs_oil.name: Old Cog's Oil
old_cogs_oil.description: A flask of black, viscous oil given by a dying smith. "Keep your joints slick, little one. The rust... it waits for us all."
